description: Creates a group of permissions for various actions that a user can perform in FinSpace.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the permission group.

parameters.name: applicationPermissions
parameters.description: The option to indicate FinSpace application permissions that are granted to a specific group. CreateDataset --- Group members can create new datasets. ManageClusters --- Group members can manage Apache Spark clusters from FinSpace notebooks. ManageUsersAndGroups --- Group members can manage users and permission groups. This is a privileged permission that allows users to grant themselves or others access to any functionality in the application. It should only be granted to trusted users. ManageAttributeSets --- Group members can manage attribute sets. ViewAuditData --- Group members can view audit data. AccessNotebooks --- Group members will have access to FinSpace notebooks. GetTemporaryCredentials --- Group members can get temporary API credentials. (string) ---

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A token that ensures idempotency. This token expires in 10 minutes. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: permissionGroupId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the permission group.
